NASA's Lunar Trailblazer mission is almost ready for liftoff.

articles.title: Turbulent Plasma: Uncovering the Source of the Universe's Magnetic Fields - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The source of magnetic fields has long been debated. New research offers clues on their origins. It isn’t just your refrigerator that has magnets on it. The earth, the stars, galaxies, and the space between galaxies are all magnetized, too. The more places sc…
articles.content:
